data.title: Similar companies to Uni-Life
data.meta_description: Companies like Uni-Life. Similar companies and competitors including the VentureRadar Innovation and Growth scores, Company Information, Location and more.
data.text:
Ocelot

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

USA

Ocelot is an AI-driven communication platform tailored for higher education institutions aiming to enhance student retention. The platform leverages advanced machine learning to provide timely and relevant information to students. Ocelot's solutions, including AI-backed texting, chatbots, and live chat, integrate with campus systems for a seamless experience. Offering a comprehensive knowledge base with over 850,000 Q&A, it enables personalized support and data-driven insights to facilitate informed decision-making and boost student success.

https://www.ocelotbot.com

Bishop Grosseteste University

University

Founded date unknown

Unknown

Bishop Grosseteste University (BGU) is an institution of higher education offering a wide range of undergraduate degree courses. Known for its commitment to student support, learning resources, and providing quality student accommodation, BGU places a strong emphasis on helping students embark on their academic journey. The university invites prospective students to discover what it has to offer through open days.

https://www.bgu.ac.uk/

Open Now

Campus Quad

Privately Held

Founded 2012

USA

CampusQuad is a mobile-first communication platform designed to elevate student engagement through easier access to co-curricular experiences and university services. It connects students to the events, resources, clubs and organizations that broaden their worldview through exposure, exploration and skill development. Universities benefit from a direct communication channel to students and real-time analytics that track and assess the participation and effectiveness of programs, services and events.

http://www.campusquad.co

ROEHAMPTON UNIVERSITY LBG

University

Founded date unknown

United Kingdom

The University of Roehampton is a higher education institution that offers a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs. With a strong emphasis on career-led teaching and student support, the university prepares its students for successful careers and fulfilling lives. It boasts a community of students from over 140 countries and is known for its research with international reach that informs policy, enriches culture, and improves lives. Roehampton provides a traditional campus experience in London, complete with modern facilities, accommodation, and a range of student activities including societies, sports, and opportunities to study abroad.

https://www.roehampton.ac.uk/

PebblePad

n/a

Founded date unknown

Unknown

PebblePad is an innovative higher education platform aimed at unifying the complete learning journey for students. It offers a flexible ePortfolio, workbook, and assessment platform that creates unique learning experiences. The software supports students from the beginning of their education journey through to alumni stage, allowing for reflection, support, and assessment to be seamlessly integrated into learning designs. PebblePad is widely adopted by institutions to enhance student engagement and outcomes, ensuring students are future-ready and equipped with professional skills.

https://pebblepad.com/

Campus Group, Inc.

Privately Held

Founded 2019

USA

Campus is an online community college startup aimed at increasing transfer rates to four-year universities. The company hires adjunct professors from top institutions and offers courses at an affordable price, with costs fully covered for students who qualify for federal Pell Grants. Campus provides all students with a laptop, Wi-Fi, access to tutors, and individual coaches to ensure they stay on track. The program also offers in-person courses in specialized fields like phlebotomy, medical assistance, and cosmetology. The company is committed to keeping education costs low and ensuring students graduate.

https://campusgroup.co/

Futurely

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

Unknown

Futurely provides guidance solutions tailored for diverse needs, including corporate welfare programs and academic path selection. The company collaborates with middle and high schools across Italy, offering students pathways to self-discovery and informed decision-making. Futurely also enables institutions to align students' interests with suitable educational and training courses through white-label solutions. Committed to supporting four of the UN's 2030 Agenda SDGs, Futurely aims to enhance individual well-being, promote education and employment opportunities, and ensure equal rights for all.

https://myfuturely.com/

CogBooks

Privately Held

Founded 2006

United Kingdom

Only learning that works; our online learning minimizes the time you spend managing students and maximizes their preparedness for class, freeing you up to do more of what you do best — teach. Because it’s built on our Advanced Adaptive Learning platform, CogBooks courseware is different to any you’ve tried before and miles ahead of your static text books. The results speak for themselves, with much greater student success and significantly lower dropout. Plug our courseware into your existing system – Blackboard, Canvas, D2L, or any other – and transport yourself to the forefront of learning. You can customize one of our readymade titles to fit your individual approach, or work with us to develop a whole new course.

http://www.cogbooks.com

jumpAgrade

Privately Held

Founded 2016

Ireland

JumpAgrade is the modern alternative to grinds. It is an online service for second-level students. It helps students prepare for exams by giving them tailored worksheets designed to address their individual learning needs and providing detailed personalised feedback on how to improve. The problem the founders saw was that in the typical classroom today, there are 25 students to one teacher. It is extremely challenging for teachers to provide one-to-one feedback to each student. JumpAgrade assesses the specific challenges facing a student and the area in which they need assistance. JumpAgrade is all about building confidence in students and ensuring that they are exam-ready – and that’s just the start of the company’s plans. JumpAgrade want to take students from learners to earners. That starts with helping students in school so they can get into the courses they want in college or University. The JumpAgrade online platform also helps prepare students for third level – making assignments available online, submitting work online and the autonomy to work at your own schedule are all ways of working that they will encounter at third level. The future for JumpAgrade is to help learners go from exam-ready to college-ready and then work-ready. JumpAgrade want to support them each step of the way. The final step would involve professional exams and professional development for life in the working world.

https://jumpagrade.com/

Roojoom

Privately Held

Founded 2013

Israel

Increase customer value by automating the process of managing and executing complex customer journeys. Roojoom’s powerful, all-in-one, fully automated Customer Journey Management Platform creates goal-oriented personal, relevant, and customized customer experiences across all channels and devices.

http://www.roojoom.com

iSchool Campus

Privately Held

Founded 2010

USA

iSchool Campus is the leader in providing Smart School technology that fully engages the individual student while empowering and inspiring teachers and parents. Combining state-of-the-art hardware with proprietary software, the company designs, builds and deploys collaborative whole-school learning environments to promote innovation and learning, and foster creativity in the classroom and at home. iSchool Campus' powerful technology includes one-to-one tablets for every student and teacher along with cutting-edge audio and video classroom resources, enabling highly personalized teaching opportunities. The company's wide array of proprietary software enables real-time collaboration on projects, testing, and classroom management, and enhances the learning experience in all disciplines with safe and secure Internet access and interactive curricula. Committed to remaining at the forefront of educational technology, iSchool Campus also provides ongoing professional development for teachers and administrators, as well as 24/7 technical support for schools and districts. Founded in 2011, iSchool Campus has offices in Washington, D.C. and Park City, Utah.

http://www.ischoolcampus.com

The Open University

University

Founded date unknown

United Kingdom

The Open University in the East of England;The OU in the East of England serves Bedfordshire, Cambridgeshire, Essex, Hertfordshire, Norfolk and Suffolk. Our Regional Centre is in Cambridge. Here 80 staff look after 21,000 students and more than 600 part-time tutors. The OU offers over 250 qualifications from certificates,diplomas and foundation degrees through to Masters and PhDs. Subjects offered include: Arts and Humanities, Business and Management, Childhood and Youth, Computing and ICT, Education, Engineering and Technology, Environment, Development and International Studies, Health and Social Care, Health Sciences, Languages, Law, Mathematics and Statistics, Psychology, Science, Social Sciences, Social Work, and Sport and Fitness. The OU and Business;The Open University, The Open University Business School and Centre for Professional Learning and Development provide professional and management skills development that deliver immediate benefit to businesses and their staff. More than 50,000 students are sponsored by their employers and about 70% of undergraduate students are in full-time employment. To find out more about what the OU can offer visit www.open.ac.uk/employers. Corporate enquirers should call +44 (0)845 366 6053. Research and Consultancy;The OU supports a vibrant research portfolio and fosters research teams who compete with top ranked institutions in the UK and worldwide. Consultancy is an important acitivity through which The Open University can encourage and support industry and businesses. If you would like to discuss whether a member of OU staff could act as a consultant to your organisation, please email: Innovation-Enterprise@open.ac.uk. OU Careers Advisory Service;For individuals, this service provides professional careers and educational advisers in every UK region to support course choice and career planning. For employers, this service may be useful if you would like to recruit OU students and graduates, find out more about the labour market, understand more about the OU student profile or sponsor employees' professional and management development. For more information visit www.open.ac.uk/careers. Global Partnerships;The Open University works with partners in the UK and internationally in a variety of ways to deliver scalable, high-quality education to students, with the option of tailoring to suit local needs. Our content licensing partnerships provide educational institutions around the world with the opportunity to license OU course material to enhance and supplement their offer. Our partnership models include: marketing partnerships, progression partnerships, licensing partnerships, teaching partnerships and the validation of qualifications. We are also open to other ideas for partnerships. To find out more, visit our Global Partnerships website www.ouworldwide.com/global_partnerships.asp. International Direct Students;The Open University is the world’s leading provider of flexible, high quality online degrees and distance learning/e learning, serving students across the world with highly respected degree qualifications, including the triple accredited MBA degree. We have around 150,000 undergraduate and more than 30,000 postgraduate students. Around 17,000 of our students live and study with us outside of the United Kingdom. The Open University's style of teaching is called supported open learning. Whether at home, at work or on the move, The OU's innovative teaching methods and materials give you the flexibility you need and bring studying to life in a way never seen before. Study through podcasts, downloads, DVDs, and forums. Access material through a range of devices, from PC to tablet to smartphone. To find out more, visit our international student website www.openuniversity.edu or call our international student advisors on +44 845 241 6555.

http://www.open.ac.uk

KinderLab Robotics

Privately Held

Founded 2013

USA

KinderLab creates toys for young children that promote learning of technical skills in a playful way. Young children learn by doing. Making and programming robots give children the chance to make their ideas physical and tangible.

http://www.kinderlabrobotics.com/

SCHOOL OF ORIENTAL AND AFRICAN STUDIES ROYAL CHARTER

University

Founded date unknown

United Kingdom

SOAS University of London, also known as the School of Oriental and African Studies, is an institution offering undergraduate, postgraduate, and research degrees. The university specializes in the arts, humanities, languages, and social sciences with a focus on Asian, African, and Middle Eastern studies. SOAS provides a unique blend of academic programs that incorporate an international perspective, flexible learning, and specialist focus. The institution also offers a virtual tour and maintains a Language Centre that shares expertise in effective language learning.

https://www.soas.ac.uk/

TERMINALFOUR Solutions

Privately Held

Founded 1996

Ireland

TERMINALFOUR is a leading developer of 'out-of-the-box' enterprise web content management software. Its systems enable medium and large sized organisations to improve the delivery and communication of information through various channels including websites, personalised portals, intranets, extranets and emerging media. It is the number one supplier to third level education institutions in the UK and Ireland and to the public sector in Ireland and has implemented systems in the United States, Canada and the Middle East. Customers include the United Nations, IDA Ireland, the Office of Public Works (Ireland), the department of the Environment, Heritage and Local Government, University of Manchester, University College Dublin, University of Oxford, Element 6 and Specsavers UK.

http://www.terminalfour.com/

Innovamat

Privately Held

Founded date unknown

Spain

Innovamat is revolutionizing the way mathematics is learned by offering a curriculum that emphasizes hands-on knowledge construction, collaborative problem-solving, and meaningful practice. Their resources, which span from early childhood to secondary education, are designed for enhancing classroom engagement through experimentation, improvisation, and adaptation. Innovamat provides a comprehensive digital platform for classroom management, manipulative materials, teacher training, and a multi-platform app with adaptive learning and progress reports. They offer personalized teaching support, with experts in math didactics available to address real-time needs.

https://www.innovamat.com

PrepMe

Privately Held

Founded 2001

USA

PrepMe is a for-profit American company that offers online courses and tutoring for standardized achievement tests, in particular those offered by the Educational Testing Service (ETS), such as the PSAT and SAT;and the ACT offered by ACT, Inc. PrepMe also developed its Coursification platform to open its adaptive online learning platform to publishers.

http://www.prepme.com/

2U, Inc.

Publicly Traded

Founded 2008

USA

Education is one of the most powerful drivers of change and upward mobility. At 2U, we empower forward-thinking universities to reimagine education, ensuring that students everywhere can dream bigger, reach their highest potential and fulfill their aspirations through life-changing educational experiences. We help universities become the best possible digital versions of themselves so they can offer more students than ever access to transformative education.

http://www.2u.com/

Appleyard Lees IP LLP

n/a

Founded date unknown

Unknown

Appleyard Lees is a leading intellectual property law firm with over 40 patent and trade mark attorneys and specialist solicitors, providing clients worldwide with a full spectrum of advice and a fully integrated approach to all aspects of IP. With a global reach and local knowledge, we are experts in patents, trade marks, IP strategy, designs, copyright, contentious proceedings and disputes. From offices in Manchester, Leeds, Halifax, Cambridge and Alderley BioHub, we support some of the world's most innovative businesses and leading academic institutions, helping them to maximise the value of their intellectual property throughout its entire life cycle.

http://appleyardlees.com/

Biopôle SA

Privately Held

Founded 2004

Switzerland

Alithea Genomics is a biotech company focused on revolutionizing large-scale RNA sequencing and transcriptomics. The firm is set to introduce advanced RNA sequencing solutions to the market, providing researchers with enhanced capabilities and efficiency. Besides, Alithea Genomics is also increasing its manufacturing capacity to meet the growing demand for its unique products. Innovation is central to the company's mission, and they are continuously working on developing novel technologies that push the boundaries of RNA sequencing.

http://www.biopole.ch

mADme

Privately Held

Founded 2012

Ireland

mADme – Creating Rich Digital Engagements throughout the Customer Lifecycle.

http://www.mad-me.com

MPOWER Financing

Privately Held

Founded 2014

USA

MPOWER’s mission is to remove financial barriers to higher education in the U.S. To accomplish this mission, MPOWER works with investors and universities to lend to high-potential students who are left out by traditional banks. In addition to providing students with access to the financial resources necessary to attend and complete college, MPOWER builds students’ credit histories, provides them with personal finance education, and offers gateway financial products to prepare them for life after college.

http://mpowerfinancing.com

University of Dundee

University

Founded date unknown

United Kingdom

The European Screening Centre, Newhouse is an integrated drug discovery/chemical biology group staffed with University of Dundee scientists that provides an array of compound screening and medicinal chemistry capabilities. With greater than 150 years of collective experience gained in pharma, biotech and academic environments the scientists have extensive knowledge of translational research and the drug discovery cycle over a wide range of target classes. The Biology group is responsible for compound characterisation and hit triaging combining biochemical and cell based techniques with state-of-the-art liquid handling robotics and automation to elucidate primary and off target activity of compounds and conduct in depth mechanism of action studies.

http://www.dundee.ac.uk/

ClassDojo

Privately Held

Founded 2011

USA

ClassDojo's long-term vision is to help every child on Earth get an education they love. Founded in 2011 and based in San Francisco, California, ClassDojo is a school communication platform that teachers, students, and families use every day to build strong relationships and supportive communities. This is done in two ways. One, by sharing what's being learned in the classroom back home through student portfolios, photos, videos, and messages. And, two, by helping students build social-emotional skills through in-classroom feedback and engaging activities. Today, 95% of pre K-8 schools in the U.S., as well as a further 180 countries, have joined ClassDojo.

http://www.classdojo.com/
